00031     static std::string UnsignedToPlayMod(unsigned pm)
00032     {
00033         switch(pm)
00034         {
00035             case AppManager::FRAG: return "FRAG";
00036             case AppManager::ALONE: return "ALONE";
00037             case AppManager::TEAM: return "TEAM";
00038             default: return "FRAG";
00039         }
00040     }
00041 
00042     static unsigned PlayModToUnsigned(std::string str)
00043     {
00044         std::transform(str.begin(), str.end(), str.begin(), ::toupper);
00045 
00046         if(str == "FRAG") return AppManager::FRAG;
00047         if(str == "ALONE") return AppManager::ALONE;
00048         if(str == "TEAM") return AppManager::TEAM;
00049         else return AppManager::FRAG;
00050     }
